overview: It's a finger lickin' lesbian love fest as an older model Puma Swede introduces a young model to a lesbian experience. Older burlesque dancer Veronica Avluv brings home a young woman Ashlyn Molloy and melts the sheets in a heat filled squirt-a-thon. Cheerleader squad leader, Scarlet Red has fun with an eager freshman Darcie Belle. A young personal trainer Jenna J. Ross gets more than she bargained for when she shows up for a yoga session with Ms. Nikki Daniels.
title: Finger Lickin Girlfriends 4
